data.text: The countries with the highest bicycle use have no helmet mandates and negligible helmet use, and are also the countries with the lowest death rates per distance traveled. They also have safe bicycling infrastructure. Helmet mandates stop people from riding, and the more bicycles there are on the road, the safer it gets. No helmet is going to save you in a serious accident, but safe bicycling infrastructure is going to prevent you from getting into a serious accident. Instead of fighting with each other over yes or no helmeting we should be advocating for safe places to ride, for all ages and abilities, so we don't need helmets.
